scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, his head bowed and loincloth draped. Below, a group of mourners are gathered. The Virgin Mary, dressed in blue and red, is shown fainting or overcome with grief, supported by other figures. A white horse with a rider in a blue robe stands to the right, observing the scene. In the background, a hilly landscape is dotted with buildings and figures, suggesting a distant city or town. The entire scene is framed by decorative borders characteristic of illuminated manuscripts.
